snippet.title: Disney Rehires Johnny Depp After Beating Amber Haerd In Court !
snippet.description:
Disney Rehires Johnny Depp After Beating Amber Heard In Court!

 What comes to your mind when you hear Amber Heard’s name? There is no one answer to this question. Everyone around the globe have seemingly mixed feelings about this 35-year-old film actress after her widely publicised relation with Johnny Depp. 
Their relationship was short lived. It started in 2015 to end with a shocking drama in 2017. No, how does it affect Depp? Well, currently, it is rumoured that Disney has reversed its decision to drop Johnny Depp and is going to cast him again for the Pirates of the Caribbean 6 sequel. 
But for those who haven’t followed this couple’s controversy, I will give a quick recap of all the twists and turns in the plot.
